\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Thomas|strong="G2381"\w*, \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1537"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w*, \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Didymus|strong="G1324"\w*,\f + \fr 20:24 \ft or, Twin\f* wasn’\w t|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* Yeshua \w came|strong="G2064"\w*.
